article.title: Booz Allen Receives Contract to Support C4I
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Booz Allen & Hamilton Incorporated has received an $18 million contract to provide U.S. Pacific Command/J-62 with information assurance net operations planning and policy development in order to become positioned to maintain information superiority through the integration of its Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence (C4I) systems.
